string-array.name: createSqlArray
string-array.item: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS account( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), erpAccount VARCHAR(100), password VARCHAR(100), staffId INTEGER, staffName VARCHAR(100), orgId INTEGER, dmsCode VARCHAR(100), rememberPassword INTEGER);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS inspection( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, sealBoxCode VARCHAR(16), boxCode VARCHAR(100), packageBarOrWaybillCode VARCHAR(100), exceptionType VARCHAR(50), receiveSiteCode INTEGER, operateType INTEGER, businessType INTEGER, userCode INTEGER, userName VARCHAR(100), siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), operateTime VARCHAR(50), stateCode INTEGER)
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS InspectionIndex1 ON Inspection(packageBarOrWaybillCode,operateType);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS InspectionIndex2 ON Inspection(boxCode,operateType);
CREATE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS InspectionIndex3 ON Inspection(stateCode);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS accountIndex ON account(id,erpAccount);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sealCar( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, sealCode VARCHAR(100), vehicleCode VARCHAR(100), driverCode INTEGER, driver VARCHAR(100));
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS sealCarIndex ON sealCar(id,sealCode);
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sealBox( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, sealCode VARCHAR(100), boxCode VARCHAR(100));
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS sealBoxIndex ON sealBox(id,sealCode);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS delivery( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, shieldsCarCode VARCHAR(100), carCode VARCHAR(100), sealBoxCode VARCHAR(100), packOrBox VARCHAR(100), turnoverBoxCode VARCHAR(100), queueNo VARCHAR(100), departureCarId VARCHAR(100), shieldsCarTime VARCHAR(100), businessType INTEGER, userCode INTEGER, userName VARCHAR(100), siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), operateTime VARCHAR(100), uploadStatus INTEGER);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS deliveryIndex ON delivery(id,packOrBox);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS errorType( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, typeName VARCHAR(100), typeCode INTEGER, memo VARCHAR(100), parentId INTEGER, nodeLevel INTEGER, typeGroup INTEGER, dataUpdate VARCHAR(100));
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS errorTypeIndex ON errorType(id,typeGroup);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sealCarError( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, shieldsCode VARCHAR(100), carCode VARCHAR(100), shieldsError VARCHAR(100), businessType INTEGER, userCode INTEGER, userName VARCHAR(100), siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), operateTime VARCHAR(100), uploadStatus INTEGER);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS sealCarErrorIndex ON sealCarError(id,uploadStatus)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sealBoxError( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, shieldsCode VARCHAR(100), boxCode VARCHAR(100), shieldsError VARCHAR(100), businessType INTEGER, userCode INTEGER, userName VARCHAR(100), siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), operateTime VARCHAR(100), uploadStatus INTEGER);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS sealBoxErrorIndex ON sealBoxError(id,uploadStatus)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sortingTally( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, receiveSiteCode INTEGER, receiveSiteName VARCHAR(100), boxCode VARCHAR(100), packageCode VARCHAR(100), isCancel INTEGER, isLoss INTEGER, featureType INTEGER, businessType INTEGER, userCode INTEGER, userName VARCHAR(100), siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), operateTime VARCHAR(100), uploadStatus INTEGER);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS sortingTallyIndex ON sortingTally(id,boxCode)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS sealBoxInfo( id INTEGER NOT NULL PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT, sealCode VARCHAR(100), boxCode VARCHAR(100), businessType INTEGER, userCode INTEGER, userName VARCHAR(100), siteCode INTEGER, siteName VARCHAR(100), operateTime VARCHAR(100), uploadStatus INTEGER);
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX IF NOT EXISTS sealBoxInfoIndex ON sealBoxInfo(id,sealCode)
